Add components to an analysis

1 Click Auxiliary Tables on the left side of the main window in DB Editor.

2 Double-click Parts Components on the list of database tables on the right side of the main window.

3 Click the Add button and select the name of the analysis in the Part column.

Example: CBC.

4 On the same row, click in the Component column and select the name of a component in the analysis.

For example: Red Blood Cells.

5 Continue adding new rows and selecting components until the analysis is complete.

6 Click Close.
